1371: Anthonius was born in Davids hof in 1371.
1380: Lost father at the age of 9.
Lost father at the age of 9.
1383: Lost mother at the age of 12.
Stoethoute took care of Anthonius since Anthonius was 13.
1384: Lost sibling Amalburga in 1384 when Amalburga was 10.
1393: Got married to Hildeburgis at age 23 in 1393.
Anthonius moved to De Tuyt.C.1 after marriage.
1394: Had a daughter with Hildeburgis, Lisebette, at age 23.
1395: Became caretaker of Lisebette at age 25.
1396: Got married a second time to Aghete at age 26 in 1396.
Had Aghete move in at De Tuyt.C.1 after marriage.
1399: Lost sibling Stoethoute in 1399 when Stoethoute was 28.
